title: Manikyam Bangaru Kadiyam: Emerald & Diamond Filigree Bangle
materials: approx. 2.0 ct total weight). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: Intricate filigree work inspired by traditional South Indian motifs. Features an elegant central emerald surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The openwork design provides a light and airy feel, blending traditional aesthetics with modern sensibilities. Handcrafted by skilled artisans.
colors: Rich yellow gold complemented by vibrant green emerald and brilliant white diamonds. A classic and timeless color combination.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special occasions. Also suitable for contemporary evening wear.
description: A unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The high-quality emerald and diamonds ensure enduring value. The intricate filigree work showcases the skill of our artisans. This Kadiyam is a symbol of prosperity and elegance, making it a treasured heirloom.
